A little girl follower.
Sue by toyomicat.

[color=#999999][size=5]--Body--[/size][/color]
UNP Skinny.
Direct use mosakaeru followers body and skeletal.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61062/?][size=3][b]Vampire Followers - Farith and Karine by mosakaeru[/b][/size][/url]

The Drunken Huntsman.

[color=#999999][size=5]--Introduction--[/size][/color]
Standalone followers.
Battle Mage.
Will use three spells.
Ice, fire, lightning.
